name: Fae
desc: Followers of the first Cryo Archon, the Winter Tsar, who were created from the bones of giant beasts and fallen frostmoon light.

customize.name: Angels
customize.desc: Also known as Heavenly envoys, their primary duties were to help people. They were later expelled from Celestia and consequently lost their bodies and minds.

customize.text: When the first angel went against the rules established by the Heavenly Principles, she handed over the power of creation, which belonged to the Primordial One, to mortals. In the deep galleries, the masters forged countless fae in the hope that one day, these little creatures might create a perfect being that could merge with the world.

customize.name: Primordial One
customize.desc: The First Descender, who defeated seven Dragon Sovereigns of the world and created people. The Primordial One may be Phanes.

customize.text:
Primordial One threw the divine nails, and the fae shrieked as they turned into icy silver mist.
The remaining fae followed the first Cryo Archon and began ruling the north.

customize.name: Nod-Krai
customize.desc: A part of Snezhnaya which was once home to an ordered and prosperous civilization.

customize.text: The fae are the nobility of Nod-Krai. Although their glory is in the past, they continue to influence the nation.
